title: Garen's q
body: So as th title says, this tpoic is about garens q, or rather, once he is going through with the auto attack animation, even if the auto is cancelled, the silence still goes off, why is this? I mean, its been around since i started playing, but i was never sure if it was a bug or not, what do you guys think?

replies.body:
He'll always be broken. Basically garen is a champion that rito won't fix. Notice that most of the 450 ip champs are fuking op
Garen, Annie, Master Yi, Warwick
its garen, he doesn't give a damn if its a bug or not

>
> its garen, he doesn't give a damn if its a bug or not

i guess not, the trouble of top lane {{item:3070}}
